body_html:
Did you mean CUDA 9.0.176? - In which case we have that version and still get the result.

I'll try CUDA 8 + cudnn 6, but I'll have to run that on a desktop as it doesn't support the new voltas (the build fails due to compute capability).

body:
Did you mean CUDA 9.0.176? - In which case we have that version and still get the result.

I'll try CUDA 8 + cudnn 6, but I'll have to run that on a desktop as it doesn't support the new voltas (the build fails due to compute capability).
